1.title: The Iowa Caucus Results and the Future of the Trump Campaign
1.plot: We cover all the results of the Iowa Caucus and provide analysis to put it in context. The implications for the Trump campaign, the controversy of the Cruz and Rubio campaigns are also examined. We also discuss the embarrassing night for Hillary. Its time for independent enlightment you won't find anywhere else.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: On show one we give a small introduction about the show and its hosts: Richard Allen and Rockne Schaller We also addressed the issues of globalization and the globalist agenda.

2.title: Donald Trump in the Debate
2.plot: Our second Show of American Veritas. On this edition for Veterans Day, we salute all our Veterans and thank them for their service to our Great Nation. We also covered the Republican Debate sponsored by Fox Business Network and the Wall Street Journal. The main topics were illegal immigration and deportation policy, taxes, TPP trade agreement and foreign policy specially with Russia and ISIS in Syria.

3.title: Paris Attacks Obama's and Trump's Response and the Refugee Program.
3.plot: The Paris Terrorist Attacks and Obama's and Donald Trump's Response. We also discuss Europe's failed immigration and assimilation process and the crises in Europe. The refugee resettlement program in the US and the Syrian military policy and more!

4.title: Russian Aircraft Shootdown
4.plot: In this Thanksgiving edition of the American Veritas Show, we discuss how Obama contradicts what his own intelligence officials say about the vetting process for the Syrian Refugee Program. Also we discuss the international implications for the shoot down of the Russian SU-24 fighter aircraft allegedly over Turkish airspace.

5.title: Show 5
5.plot: On this edition of The American Veritas Show we discuss Donald Trump's recent interviews. Trumps defends his statement of Muslims celebrating after 9/11 based on media reports. Trump also discusses the irresponsible and reckless Syrian refugee policy. Additionally, Trump discusses the Colorado shooting at Planned Parenthood and the media double standard in coverage.

6.title: California Terror Attacks
6.plot: On this edition we discuss the latest intelligence and media reporting on the California terrorists attacks in San Bernardino that show evidence of much earlier radicalization of the shooters than initially reported and the links of their family to possible Islamic radical groups. We also discuss Donald Trump's controversial statements regarding a ban on all Muslims traveling to the United States. Is this policy statement really incompatible with American values and the history of US immigration law? We look at the facts as well and much more.

7.title: Show 7
7.plot:

-1.title: Special Report
-1.plot: This special report explains why most of the media pundits have been wrong and proves how Donald Trump is the most electable candidate that can beat Hillary Clinton in a general election. Hillary's war on women exposed.

imdb.title: The American Veritas Show
plot: _The American Veritas Show_ (qv) follows conservative political issues and trending events of U.S. and world politics and news.::Carmen Allen
